casebody.data:
Douglas W. KLEMZ, Appellant-Cross/Appellee-Respondent,
v.
HORIZON BANK, et al., Appellees-Cross/Appellants-Petitioners. Court of Appeals Case No. 64A05-1611-TR-2617 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 15, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

RILEY , J.

Reversed and remanded.

PYLE, J., Concurs.

ROBB, J., Concurs in part and dissents in part with separate opinion.
